TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExpressionContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种在序列化程序之间传递上下文状态的方法。

span.span: Provides a means of passing context state among serializers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将放置在上下文堆栈上, 并在序列化过程中包含最相关的表达式。An is placed on the context stack and contains the most relevant expression during serialization. 下面C#的代码演示了赋值。The following C# code demonstrates an assignment. ```csharp button1.Text = "Hello"; ``` 在序列化过程中, 多个序列化程序负责创建这一语句。During serialization, several serializers are responsible for creating this single statement. 其中一个序列化程序负责创建 "Hello"。One of those serializers is responsible for creating "Hello". 有时, 序列化程序可能需要了解它在其中创建其表达式的上下文。There are times when that serializer may need to know the context in which it is creating its expression. 在前面的示例中, 不需要此上下文。In the previous example, this context is not needed. 以下C#代码显示了需要了解上下文的情况。The following C# code shows a situation in which knowledge of the context is necessary. ```csharp button1.Text = rm.GetString("button1_Text"); ``` 在这种情况下, 需要知道负责创建资源表达式的序列化程序的目标对象的名称。In this case, the serializer responsible for creating the resource expression needs to be informed of the names of the target objects. 该类可用于此。The class can be used for this. 由于每个序列化程序创建一个表达式并调用序列化程序来处理整个语句的一部分, 因此, 序列化程序将表达式上下文推送到上下文堆栈上。As each serializer creates an expression and invokes a serializer to handle a smaller part of the statement as a whole, the serializer pushes an expression context on the context stack. 每个表达式上下文都有一个用于查找堆栈上的下一个表达式上下文的 parent 属性。Each expression context has a parent property that locates the next expression context on the stack. 这提供了一种方便的遍历功能。This provides a convenient traversal capability.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用来确定在赋值给表达式时是否需要强制转换。You can use to determine if a cast is needed when assigning to the expression.

summary.span: 获取拥有此表达式的对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果表达式是对调用`button1`的实例的属性的属性引用, 则返回`button1`。If the expression is a property reference to the property of an instance of called `button1`, returns `button1`.
